abstract: The software-maker BEA Systems reported increases in net income and revenue, stoking its arguments that Oracle’s takeover offer is too low.
snippet: The software-maker BEA Systems reported increases in net income and revenue, stoking its arguments that Oracle’s takeover offer is too low.
lead_paragraph: BEA Systems has been hoping to prove it is worth more than the $6.7 billion that Oracle offered to pay for it last month.

headline.main: BEA Tries to Prove Its Worth to Oracle
headline.print_headline: BEA Tries to Prove Its Worth to Oracle
